description:
Fuurin Middle has fought their way to the district tournament finals with just 9 players, and finally faces off against Oobi Middle, where a bunch of ex Yokohama Senior players are.
When Daigo sees the two left-handed players, Mayumura Michiru on short stop, and Idemitsu on second, combined with their starting pitcher Seto and catcher Uozumi, he realizes what Oobi Middle`s strategy with their center line is. Then, when Fuurin`s top batter Chisato knocks a ball to Michiru on short stop, but then...
Source: crunchyroll
